friday.name: The Shin-Saver Circuit
notes: 4 Rounds: A -> B -> C -> D with No Rest between exercises
Rest 2 mins after completing all 4 exercises, then repeat

finisher.form: Forearm on bench, palm down. Lift with help, lower slowly (5 sec).
finisher.name: DB Wrist Extension Eccentrics (Rehab)

exercises.form: Lie face down on incline bench. Arms form a Y.
exercises.name: Incline DB "Y" Raises

exercises.form: Fast tempo
exercises.name: Push-ups

exercises.form: Neutral grip.
exercises.name: Chest-Supported Row

exercises.form: 5min warmup, 10 rounds: 30s all-out/60s easy, 10min cooldown
exercises.name: Cycling HIIT

exercises.form: Zone 2.
exercises.name: Stationary Bike

monday.goal: Build wire-strong muscle density. Low Reps.
monday.name: Density Strength

exercises.form: Neutral grip (palms facing each other). Full range of motion.
exercises.name: Neutral Grip Lat Pulldowns

exercises.form: Slow 3-second lower. Explosive up.
exercises.name: DB Push Press

exercises.form: Use Straps. Push hips back. Feel hamstring stretch.
exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)

exercises.form: Rear foot elevated. Focus on front leg drive.
exercises.name: Single-Leg Bulgarian Split Squats

exercises.form: Hold heavy DB, 3s up, 4s down on affected leg. Achilles strengthening.
exercises.name: Heavy Slow Resistance (HSR) Calf Raises

exercises.form: Forearm on bench, palm down. Lift with help, lower slowly (5 sec) with bad arm.
exercises.name: DB Wrist Extension Eccentrics (Rehab)

exercises.form: Zone 2 pace. Adidas Ultraboost shoes.
exercises.name: 2-Mile Treadmill Run

exercises.form: Zone 2. Consistent cadence.
exercises.name: Stationary Bike

exercises.form: Adidas Ultraboost shoes. 5-6 miles easy pace. Aerobic base building.
exercises.name: Zone 2 Treadmill Bank

tuesday.name: Waist & Core
notes: No warmup section - exercises go straight into core work

exercises.form: Controlled rotation. 15 reps per side.
exercises.name: Cable Woodchoppers

exercises.form: Walk hands out to plank, walk back. Slow and controlled.
exercises.name: Hand Walkouts (Inchworms)

exercises.form: Lower back glued to floor. Rock like a boat. Ribs down.
exercises.name: Hollow Body Rocks

exercises.form: Lower back stays on floor.
exercises.name: Lying Leg Raises

exercises.form: Rope to forehead. Light weight.
exercises.name: Face Pulls

exercises.form: Jump up, lower for slow 5-second count. Neutral grip only.
exercises.name: Neutral Grip Pull-up Negatives

exercises.form: Do not jog. Walk aggressively.
exercises.name: Power Walk (Velocity Hike)

exercises.form: Pre-run dynamic warm-up: leg swings, ankle hops, dynamic stretches
exercises.name: 5 min Jog

finisher.name: Frozen Water Bottle Roll (Foot Care)
finisher.notes: Roll frozen water bottle under feet immediately when home.

exercises.form: Saucony Triumph 23 shoes. Conversational pace (~11:30/mi). Follow 10K roadmap distances.
exercises.name: OUTDOOR Long Run
exercises.notes: 30 seconds Sprint (9.0+ mph) / 90 seconds Walk. 20 Mins total.

thursday.name: Endurance
notes: Recovery bike is mandatory - flushes lactic acid

exercises.form: 45 minutes easy pace. Complete rest day for legs.
exercises.name: Active Recovery Bike
exercises.notes: 4.0 to 5.0 Miles. Lubricate toes. Playlist: 170 BPM.

wednesday.name: Fat Incinerator
notes: This is the biggest calorie burner of the week

exercises.form: Saucony Triumph 23 shoes. Negative splits practice. 3-4 miles.
exercises.name: OUTDOOR Tempo Run
